column2: Archaic are blessed with a modest extension of life, coupled with a refined elegance and a profound affinity for historical lore. These beings exhibit a keen awareness of their surroundings, harmoniously blending age-old wisdom with a timeless, graceful presence.

A celestial race known for their ethereal beauty and cosmic wisdom. Possessing a unique blend of ancient tradition and cosmic connection, they are revered as guardians and wise rulers across many worlds.

Neanderthals boast a robust and stocky build, with pronounced brow ridges, wide noses, and a short stature. Adapted for survival in colder climates, they possess powerful muscles and a unique neural wiring that lends them an innate talent for spatial tasks and tracking.

Titans are immense beings known for their towering stature and intelligence. Their imposing presence, both in diplomacy and on the battlefield, often overshadows their deep wisdom and ancient traditions.

Mau'Khet are characterized by agile, graceful movements and sharp, perceptive senses, evoking an air of feline mystique. They display a unique blend of curiosity and independence, combined with a sleek and stealthy demeanor."

Denisovan are distinguished by striking green skin and small tusks, accentuating their rugged and imposing appearance. Known for their exceptional resilience and combat prowess, they are formidable in both physical strength and enduring spirit, often dominating in roles of warriors and protectors.
This character, though not a member of any of the otherworlden religions, understand many of their faiths and sympathises with them.
